name: Box - Fu! Beta for PC
description:
Box-fu! by UDGames is a game in which you play as a box who has to reach the end of the path to win! It's very simple, yet fun! 

(I accidentally deleted the old page... so this is the new page from now)

Here's the version for PCs:

https://udgames.itch.io/box-fu-beta-phones

If you notice any bugs or want to give suggestions, please go here:
https://forms.gle/DGNduRikMCq84EhK
